# readlink

**Instance Property**

Properties of an event that indicates the reading of a symbolic link.

## Declaration

```swift
var readlink: es_event_readlink_t { get set }
```

## Symbolic Link Events

- **link**: Properties of an event that indicates the creation of a hard link.
- **unlink**: Properties of an event that indicates the deletion of a file.

items.description: Properties of an event that indicates the creation of a hard link.

items.description: Properties of an event that indicates the deletion of a file.
